QuestData.Title: Challiane Vineyards
QuestData.Description: Please, outsider, help me.$b$bMy recipe for Nightrose wine was to be the toast of Queen Azshara herself. But before I could make it, the vile vintners took it from me and locked me away.$b$bPlease, recover my recipe so that I might bring it to Lady Challiane and earn the queen's favor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the 3 parts of the Nightrose recipe.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found the pieces of the recipe?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, outsider! Thank you very much.$b$BYou have done more for me than my own people ever have.$b$bLady Challiane would never take the word of a lowly cellarman over her vintners.$b$bNow I can use this recipe to earn her favor, and then the favor of our beloved queen Azshara...
